Comment: REC_TYP cannot be null and is hardcoded to "BDY"
SRC_SYS_ID cannot be null and is SRC_SYS_ID is hardcoded to "IBGC"
BSL_REC_TYP cannot be null and BSL_REC_TYP is hardcoded to "EXP"
VAR_REC_IND cannot be null and VAR_REC_IND is hardcoded to "N"

Rule: {NONEMPTY(CR_VALTN_ADJ_AMT_CURR_CD) if OSFI_EXP_TYP in ['OTCDRV', 'EXCDRV'] and (EMPTY(QCCP_IND) or QCCP_IND == 'N') else True}
Comment: CR_VALTN_ADJ_AMT_CURR_CD cannot be null if OSFI_EXP_TYP is OTCDRV or EXCDRV, and QCCP_IND is null or 'N'.

Rule: {(NONEMPTY(GL_ACCT_NO) and len(GL_ACCT_NO) == 9) if (BSL_REC_TYP=='EXP' and HLD_TRD_BK_IND=='Y' and OSFI_EXP_TYP in ['OTCDRV','EXCDRV']) else True}
Comment: GL_ACCT_NO cannot be null and must be 9 characters in length, for BSL_REC_TYP ="EXP", and HLD_TRD_BK_IND ="Y", and OSFI_EXP_TYP: OTCDRV/EXCDRV

Rule: {(NONEMPTY(HLD_TRD_BK_IND) and HLD_TRD_BK_IND in ['Y','N','M']) if OSFI_EXP_TYP in ['REPOST','OTCDRV','EXCDRV'] else True}
Comment: HLD_TRD_BK_IND must be 'Y', 'N' or 'M' for OSFI_EXP_TYP REPOST/OTCDRV/EXCDRV, and cannot be null.
CR_VALTN_ADJ_AMT cannot be null if QCCP_IND <> 'Y'
